name: CVE-2015-6100
description: The kernel in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT Gold and 8.1, and Windows 10 Gold and 1511 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka "Windows Kernel Memory Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability," a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-6101.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_rt:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:itanium:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1511:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_rt_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
